short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up selected text using ChatGPT using your own prompts and show the results on the same page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NOTE: You must have OpenAI API Key to use this extension.

First open options, enter your API key and add some prompts. (have a look at the screenshots for inspiration).
Then while browsing a website, select any text, right click it and select one of your prompts.
Result of the prompt will show up in a tiny pop-up on the page which you can dismiss using the close button.
